mk.imdb.core
Class IMDbParameters

java.lang.Object
  mk.imdb.core.IMDbParameters
Direct Known Subclasses:
IMDbSearchByIdParameters, IMDbSearchByTitleParameters
public abstract class IMDbParameters
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class that represents a list of parameter useful to make the API calls.

Author:
Mirko Polato
